sourcesContent: const e=async e=>{const t=await e.getFile();return t.handle=e,t};var t=async(t=[{}])=>{Array.isArray(t)||(t=[t]);const i=[];t.forEach((e,t)=>{i[t]={description:e.description||"",accept:{}},e.mimeTypes?e.mimeTypes.map(a=>{i[t].accept[a]=e.extensions||[]}):i[t].accept["*/*"]=e.extensions||[]});const a=await window.showOpenFilePicker({id:t[0].id,startIn:t[0].startIn,types:i,multiple:t[0].multiple||!1,excludeAcceptAllOption:t[0].excludeAcceptAllOption||!1}),c=await Promise.all(a.map(e));return t[0].multiple?c:c[0]};export{t as default};
